title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-hosted LLM runner with a simple CLI and REST API that lets you pull, run, and chat with open-source models like Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, etc. on macOS, Linux, and Windows.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: synchronous and async clients, streaming chat/generate, embeddings, and model management helpers.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers; supports chat, generate, pull, create, delete, and embeddings with full TypeScript types.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package providing Ollama LLM, chat, and embeddings components; installable via pip/langchain-ollama.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (formerly Ollama WebUI): chat UI, model manager, RAG, multi-user, dark/light themes, Docker image available.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API, streaming, chat, generate, pull, and embeddings support; published to Maven Central.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing async/sync bindings to Ollama’s REST API, including chat, generate, pull, create, and embeddings with Tokio support.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app that streams responses from a local Ollama server; useful starter template for web integrations.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Visual Studio Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions and chat sidebar.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI for Ollama with conversation history, markdown rendering, and prompt templates; installable via pip.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset, exposing Ollama models as Haystack generators for RAG pipelines; available on PyPI.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook with Python/JS snippets for common Ollama tasks: streaming, function-calling, embeddings, Docker, CI, etc.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight RAG example using Ollama + SentenceTransformers + Chroma to chat with local PDFs; fully local, no cloud calls.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama responses into any channel; supports slash commands, conversation memory, and model switching.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support, PVC, and service exposure; published to ArtifactHub.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix package definition for Ollama enabling reproducible installs on Linux/macOS with CUDA and ROCm variants.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a service in CI pipelines for integration testing of LLM-dependent apps.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate on crates.io offering strongly-typed async bindings to Ollama’s API with examples and docs.

title: ollama-go
summary: Unofficial Go client for Ollama with idiomatic structs and streaming support; go get github.com/jmorganca/ollama-go.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot that answers questions using local Ollama models; supports threads, app mentions, and model selection via slash commands.
